subject: RE: Reminder: Order #SSN1850, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,I would be grateful if you would please refund my money. The shifter doesn't work!Jeff SparksSent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
-------- Original message --------From: SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> Date: 7/11/25  1:43 PM  (GMT-07:00) To: captain.sparks@comcast.net Subject: Reminder: Order #SSN1850, how did it go? Hello Jeff,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌Hello Jeff,We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.SIMSONN PC USB 6+R H Simulator Gear Shifter6+RDislike itLove it!Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi captain. sparks@comcast. net,      What issue are you experiencing? Please provide a video so we can verify and assist you promptly.
